## Project Components

### 1. Conceptualization

#### Literature Review 

- Map current research landscape
- Identify research gaps
- Document theoretical frameworks
- Create synthesis matrix

#### Research Questions

- Draft initial research questions
- Validate with theoretical framework
- Assess feasibility
- Define scope and limitations

#### Target Journals

- Select primary and backup journals
- Review submission guidelines
- Analyze recent publications
- Note special requirements

### 2. Project Setup

#### Repository Structure

- Initialize Git repository
- Set up branch protection
- Configure CI/CD pipeline
- Document setup procedures

#### Data Management

- Create data dictionary
- Define validation rules
- Set up backup procedures
- Document data flow

### 3. IRB Process

#### Protocol Development

- Draft research protocol
- Create consent forms
- Design data collection instruments
- Document security measures

#### Submission Process

- Complete IRB application
- Submit supporting documents
- Track review process
- Document modifications

### 4. Pre-registration

#### OSF Setup

- Create project workspace
- Link GitHub repository
- Upload protocols
- Set access permissions

#### Registration

- Document hypotheses
- Specify analysis plan
- Define variables
- Register project timeline

### 5. Publication Process

#### Manuscript Development

- Follow journal guidelines
- Include required sections
- Create tables/figures
- Format references correctly

#### Review Response

- Track reviewer comments
- Document changes made
- Maintain version control
- Archive communications

## Publication Checklist

- [ ] Clear research question explanation (<2 pages)
- [ ] Gap identification in scholarship
- [ ] Data/method significance
- [ ] Research impact statement
- [ ] Manuscript roadmap
